title: Different GPU memory not all allocated
body_html:
System information

  • Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow):
    no
  • OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04):
    win10
  • TensorFlow installed from (source or binary):
    binary
  • TensorFlow version (use command below):
    1.1
  • Python version:
    3.6
  • Bazel version (if compiling from source):
  • CUDA/cuDNN version:
    cuda8.0,cudnn5.5
  • GPU model and memory:
    GTX Titan 6GB, GTX 1080Ti 11GB

Describe the problem

Note that tensorflow will allocate tensor/op to all available gpus, but i only got 1080Ti occupied, I wonder if it's a bug or tensorflow doesn't support different gpu models.

body:
### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow)**:
no
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**:
win10
- **TensorFlow installed from (source or binary)**:
binary
- **TensorFlow version (use command below)**:
1.1
- **Python version**: 
3.6
- **Bazel version (if compiling from source)**:
- **CUDA/cuDNN version**:
cuda8.0,cudnn5.5
- **GPU model and memory**:
GTX Titan 6GB, GTX 1080Ti 11GB

### Describe the problem
Note that tensorflow will allocate tensor/op to all available gpus, but i only got 1080Ti occupied, I wonder if it's a bug or tensorflow doesn't support different gpu models.
